original_title: დედა-შვილი ან ღამე არ არის არასდროს ბოლომდე ბნელი
overview: Lana Gogoberidze's documentary about her mother, Nutsa, the first female filmmaker in Georgia, through the prism of their relationship, their movies, and the times of repression.
title: Mother And Daughter, Or The Night Is Never Complete
